sentences.english: Thoracic malformations, commonly known as chicken, children, the typical symptoms of calcium deficiency.
sentences.chinese: 胸廓發育畸形，俗稱雞胸，是兒童缺鈣的典型症狀。

sentences.english: The patient was therefore transferred to theatre for immediate thoracotomy.
sentences.chinese: 因此病人被送到手術室立即作胸廓切開術。

sentences.english: This is two common thoracic deformity.
sentences.chinese: 這是兩種常見的胸廓畸形。

sentences.english: After that, thorax shrink, the meatus of esophagus turn in again, the voice behavior is over.
sentences.chinese: 後胸廓縮小，食管入口黏膜再次內翻，發聲結束。

sentences.english: Besides, all patients had thoracolumbar kyphosis with increased antero- posterior chest diameter at this level.
sentences.chinese: 均見脊柱胸腰段後突，該水平胸廓前後徑增大。

sentences.english: Proper placement of the axillary roll is under the thorax caudad to the axilla.
sentences.chinese: 腋窩卷的正確使用方法，是放在腋窩的尾端的胸廓下。

sentences.english: The arm swing drived the thorax rotation to some extent.
sentences.chinese: 手臂的擺動一定程度上帶動了胸廓的旋轉。

sentences.english: The pectoralis minor muscle contracts in a closed-chain fashion to lift the lower ribs and open the chest.
sentences.chinese: 胸小肌向下巴的方向收縮，上提肋骨下緣，打開胸廓。

sentences.english: H. Observe lung inflations and auscultate the chest for adequate ventilation.
sentences.chinese: 觀察胸廓起伏並行肺部聽診明確是否充分換氣。

definition: thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
diaphragm/also written 橫隔膜|横隔膜[heng2 ge2 mo2]
pectoralis major muscle (across the top of the chest)
sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
serratus anterior muscle (upper sides of the chest)
pleural cavity (part of thorax containing lungs)
